pageContext.title: Supply Theme Slider (PRO)
pageContext.miniDescription: Custom slideshow for the Shopify's Supply theme product page. Swipe, arrows, thumbnails and much more.
pageContext.description:
Premium quality, hand coded slider for the Shopify's official Supply theme. Coded by a certified Shopify partner.


One image is worth a thousand words, but one live preview's worthiness is beyond evaluation! So check this slider working live clicking here. (Password: 123)


→ Live Demo ← (Password: 123)


What you'll get:


This plugin creates extra options at the customize page of your theme.


Below, whichever options have (customizable) are options that you'll be to enable, disable and/or customize in some way.


Here are all the main features:


- Swipe featured image

- Featured image arrows (customizable - enable for desktop only, mobile only or both)

- Featured image loop (customizable)

- Sliding smooth animation (customizable - you can enable or disable it)

- Zoom on mouse hover️ (customizable, desktop only)

- Swipe thumbnails

- Thumbnail arrows (customizable - enable for desktop only, mobile only or both)

- Thumbnail images loop (customizable)

- Amount of visibile thumbnails: 3, 4, 5, 6 or use the default Supply's thumbnails without slider. You can choose a different number for desktop & mobile devices, for example, show 6 thumbnails on desktop and 3 on mobile.

- Add border to currently chosen thumbnail (customizable - you can change the color & enable/disable)

- Currently chosen thumbnail alignment (left, center or right).

- Thumbnail vertical alignment (top or center)

- Adaptive height - slider automatically adapts to images with different heights.

- Update featured image to its equivalent variant whenever changing a variant through the dropdown (works exclusively with dropdowns. If you're using custom swatches or buttons to show variants this function will not work.)

- Update dropdown whenever changing an image to its equivalent variant (works exclusively with dropdowns. If you're using custom swatches or buttons to show variants this function will not work.)

- Update the featured image if a variant is on the URL

- Arrows transparency (customizable)

- Lazyload to improve performance (customizable)

- Life time free updates

- Life time free bug fixes

- Constantly maintained and improved



Installation:


Installation takes less than 1 minute.


You just need to copy and paste the files that come in this product in your theme.


Detailed instructions can be found here.


Support:


We give 100% support to all of its users to ensure that what you're seeing on the demo page is exactly what you see on your website, same day responses are guaranteed.


If you have any questions, troubles or find bugs just reach out to me:


ezfycode@gmail.com


Important Notes:


✓ This code works exclusively on the Supply Theme


✓ If you have custom code in the product page (inside the file product-template.liquid), this code may overwrite them. If you'd like to install the slider and keep your product page customizations (in case there are any), we offer custom integration for an additional fee of $30 USD.


✓ The thumbnails work only below the main image, not on the right side.


﻿Unsure whether it would work on your theme? Send us an email and we'll be more than happy to help you figure it out.


﻿ezfycode@gmail.com


FAQ:


Q: What is included in the support?

A: We ensure that whatever you see in the demo page is what appears on your own website. In addition, any bugs you find will be promptly investigated and fixed.


Q: Do you offer refunds?

A: Taking into consideration that it's a digital product with a live demo we do not offer refunds.


If you have any unanswered questions please feel free to reach out to us before making your purchase, we'll be happy to help.


Thank you!

relatedProducts.title: Slideshow Section (PRO)
relatedProducts.miniDescription: Premium slideshow section. More than 50 customization options. Works on all themes, no apps required.
relatedProducts.description:
The Slideshow Section (PRO) is a code snippet that adds a gorgeous slideshow section to your theme. Carefully crafted by certified Shopify Partners.

No apps.
Compatible with all themes. (paid, free or custom made.)
Loads faster than any app.

→ Live Demo ←








What you'll get:


This code works out of the box with any theme using sections.


At the customize page you'll be able to change options to your liking, such as:


- Multiple height options: set an unique height for desktop and mobile devices



- Parallax: keep the image still when scrolling. Enable on mobile only, desktop only or both.



- Autoplay: automatically goes to the next image every X seconds. You can choose any value from 3 to 20 seconds.
- Navigation: Choose between dots, bars or none. Colors are fully customizable, plus you can customize the dots' size. (the bars size can not be customized).




- Arrows: show arrows on desktop and/or on mobile devices. Size and colors fully customizable.



- Text animations: enable or disable text animations when changing from slide to slide.
- Image: use any image for desktop and, optionally, a different one for mobile. Control the focal point of each image to ensure the subject of your photo is visible. You can also show images full width, without cutting them off.



- Lazyload: the section loads only images that are visible to improve performance
- Text: control all text, font sizes, set unique values for desktop & mobile. Absolute freedom:



- Text alignment: control where to align your text (left, center, right, bottom left, bottom center & bottom right). You can set individual options for each slide. The first slide can have its text aligned to the left and the second to the right, for example.



- Buttons: add up to two buttons for each slide. Full ability to customize the link, text, text color, border color background color and font size. You can also make the whole image clickable instead.



- Text shadow: add a shadow behind the text to improve readability. Customizable color and intensity
- Image overlay: darken images to improve readability. Customizable color and intensity
- Image change animation: choose between fade or slide
- Use as many sections as you wish on a single page
- Fully compatible with Online Store 2.0
- Make the Slideshow match any theme's design with multiple color & size control options


Installation:


Installation takes 30 seconds. Please find detailed instructions clicking here.


Support:


We give 100% support to all of its users to ensure that what you're seeing on the demo page is exactly what you see on your website, same day responses are guaranteed.


If you have any questions, troubles or find bugs just reach out to us at:


ezfycode@gmail.com


FAQ:


Question: Does it work with videos?

Answer: No, the Slideshow Section (PRO) does not work with videos.

Q. I need custom coding in this slideshow. Can you do it?
A. Yes, we do offer custom coding as an additional service, it is not included in the price of the slideshow. Please email us with your website URL and further details for a more accurate quote.

Q: What is included in the support?

A: We ensure that whatever you see on the demo page is what appears on your own website. In addition, any bugs will be promptly investigated and fixed.


Q: Do you offer refunds?

A: Taking into consideration that it's a digital product with a live demo we do not offer refunds. However we do guarantee the slideshow will work on any theme with sections.


Thank you!

relatedProducts.title: Anti Theft - Disable Right Click
relatedProducts.miniDescription: Block right click, image copying, text copying, keyboard shortcuts and much more. Loads faster than any app.
relatedProducts.description:
Improve your website's safety by restricting what your users can copy. Disable right click, image copying, text copying and more!

By default, apps offering this type of feature are obliged to load only after the website's fully loaded, giving room for the content to still be copied. Hard-coding this into your theme will ensure that even before your website starts loading the content that you have configured is already blocked.

Coded by an official Shopify Partner.

→ Live Demo ←

What you'll get:


This plugin enables multiple options on your theme's Customize page to control its security.

Here are the main features:


- Loads instantly. with the EZFY Anti Theft code snippet, the content is blocked even before the website is loaded.



- Block text selection on desktop & mobile (customizable)

- Block image saving/copying on desktop & mobile (customizable)
- Disable images "save as" when right clicking on top of images. (including background images and SVG files)

- Block right click
- Disable images drag and drop
- Block keyboard shortcuts (blocks the following shortcuts: CTRL + A, CTRL + C, CTRL + S and CTRL + P).
- Block developer tools shortcuts (blocks shortcuts that can access your website's source code: F12, CTRL + SHIFT + I and CTRL + SHIFT + C)
- Alert message (if the user tries to access some blocked content, shows up a message for them. You can fully customize the message and turn it off if you wish!)
- Developer tools message (shows a warning message on the developer tools for users who try to view your website's source code. It is fully customizable as well.)


- Extremely lightweight (does not slow down any theme)

- Life time free updates

- Life time free bug fixes

- Constantly maintained and improved




Installation:


Installation takes less than 1 minute.


You just need to copy and paste the files received upon download.


Detailed instructions can be found here.


Support:


We give 100% support to all of its users to ensure that what you're seeing on the demo page is exactly what you see on your website, same day responses are guaranteed.


If you have any questions, troubles or find bugs just reach out to us:

A: We ensure that whatever you see on the demo page is what appears on your own website. In addition, any bugs you find will be promptly investigated and fixed.


Q: Do you offer refunds?

A: Taking into consideration that it's a digital product with a live demo we do not offer refunds. However we do guarantee the EZFY Anti Theft code snippet will work on any Shopify theme.


If you have any unanswered questions please feel free to reach out to us before making your purchase, we'll be happy to help.
